awards:
第69届威尼斯电影节(2012)
　　地平线单元奖 最佳影片(提名) 罗伯托·米勒维尼
　　克里斯托弗·D·史密瑟斯基金特别奖 罗伯托·米勒维尼

writer.name: 罗伯托·米勒维尼 Roberto Minervini

director.name: 罗伯托·米勒维尼 Roberto Minervini

introduction: A 12 year old boy and his single mother live parallel lives. The boy spends his days alone while his mother works and goes out with her friends. The boy's solitude is both a source of freedom and a cause for grief. His explorations slowly bring to light the dark contrast between the rules of society and the laws of nature. And before long, the delicate balance of his inner world becomes shattered by unforeseen events.
